Edited to correct alignments and prepared for the Frankenstein Variorum spine on 2019-04-14T18:17:32.719-04:00.

rdgGrp.rdg: which was enjoined me. I found that I could not compose a female without again devoting several months to profound study and labo<pb n="002" xml:id="F1818_v3_006"/>rious disquisition. I had heard of some discoveries having been made by an English philosopher, the knowledge of which was material to my success, and I sometimes thought of obtaining my father’s consent to visit England for this purpose; but I clung to every pretence of delay, and

which was enjoined me. I found that I could not compose a female without again devoting several months to profound study and laborious disquisition. I had heard of some discoveries having been made by <pb n="90" xml:id="F1823_v2_363"/>an English philosopher, the knowledge of which was material to my success, and I sometimes thought of obtaining my father’s consent to visit England for this purpose; but I clung to every pretence of delay, and

which was enjoined me. I found that I could not compose a female without again devoting several months to profound study and laborious disquisition. I had heard of some discoveries having been made by an English philosopher, the knowledge of which was material to my success, and I sometimes thought of obtaining my father’s consent to visit England for this purpose; but I clung to every pretence of delay, and

which was enjoined me. I found that I could not compose a female without again devoting several months to profound study and labo<pb n="002" xml:id="F1818_v3_006"/>rious disquisition. I had heard of some discoveries having been made by an English philosopher, the knowledge of which was material to my success, and I sometimes thought of obtaining my father’s consent to visit England for this purpose; but I clung to every pretence of delay, and
could not resolve to interrupt my returning tranquillity.
could not resolve to interrupt my returning tranquillity.
could not resolve to interrupt my returning tranquillity.
